Reviews.Title: Excellent Experience With This Phone - Please Read for Details...
Reviews.Author: Daisy S "Daisy S"
Reviews.Content: I owned this phone for about a year with NO PROBLEMS. It is just that I change out phones often as I am a techie and have to have the latest phone/tablet, etc. And so I upgrade very often. However, the phone worked perfectly for the time I owned it, so here is my detailed review, and I hope that it will help you make a good decision if you need a great smartphone at this great price!Pros:- Very clear and easy to read 4.5" screen.- Outstanding colors and outstanding screen clarity.- 2.2 Android allowed me to save many installed apps on my SD External card. (Cannot do this anymore after OS 3.0 and higher).- Great camera - I took many high quality pictures.- Wonderful music player app (the stock one was just right and makes great playlists,etc). Sound quality excellent.- Got 4g on the Internet Data.- WiFi came in clear and fast.- Overall a easy to use and perfect size phone and comfortable to hold with big enough screen.Cons:- NO FM Radio. However, I installed Tune In Radio so if I had WiFi on, I could listen to all kinds of radio stations.- Could use more memory, yet it still ran fast for me.Good phone, after owning it for about a year, I upgraded to Samsung Galaxy Note N7000 with 5.3 screen. However, that one was too large and heavy to hold and I upgraded again. However, at times, I kind of miss my old Infuse as it was big enough at 4.5" and not a heavy phone to hold. And at the price offered, it is a good deal for a nice phone.Also, I am a techie and know a lot about Android devices that is smartphones and tablets, so if you have any questions, please ask me in the comment section.Hope that this review has been helpful to you and thank you for reading it.

Reviews.Title: Not worth much
Reviews.Author: LaShelle Harris
Reviews.Content: Phone worked fine for a couple of weeks then all of a sudden stopped working, wouldnt come on and the samsung logo kept popping on the screen and nothing else. Contacted the seller within a month and they LIED!!!!!

Reviews.Title: cant update the OS
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: firmware can not be update, communication failed every time with the at&t; server. my old nexus ruined on 4.1.2 now i am on 2.1 android version... i hate.

Reviews.Title: Good condition.
Reviews.Author: Kaldren Edwards
Reviews.Content: The phone was a little more worn than I expected. The phone is also locked to AT&T;, I thought I would have gotten an unlocked phone. Overall the phone was worth it though.

Reviews.Title: Love my phone!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Owens
Reviews.Content: Love my phone!!! And for a great price. It is exactly what I needed. I will shop through this company again.

Reviews.Title: Great phone Infuse 4G
Reviews.Author: john coffman
Reviews.Content: This was an unplanned purchase as my blackberry 9800 died again.  Got this phone as a replacement.  Easy to setup. works great and love the mobile hotspot.  Only thing that is a issue is battery life is just like all smartphones.  I cured that by getting the extended battery and cover from amazon also.

Reviews.Title: This phone sucks!
Reviews.Author: Grrrr
Reviews.Content: This is the worst phone I have ever owned, I am on my second Infuse and it still freezes, blanks out, shuts itself off, drops calls, looses the network. I am constently doing a soft reboot of the phone. DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE IT IS A WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great phon
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: Tis is a great phone, larger than most but I needed a phone I could really read even if I didn't have my glasses on.  Great camera, 8 megapixels which is very clear.  Easy to use even for me who is not very savvy as far as technical gadgets go....

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: saintcin
Reviews.Content: This is the best phone I have ever used. It has a big screen to surf the net with. Battery life is excellent. Fast as lighting. Takes the best pictures of any Phone I have had. Works great with Hot Spot. LOVE IT!!!!
